description:
Small Studio with private entrance and private bathroom. Includes 55 Inch Flat Screen TV, Cable with Premium Channels, Wifi, fridge and microwave. You’ll love my place because of easy access to Manhattan and Brooklyn via Public Transportation, wonderful area restaurants and shops and 2 miles from local south beach. My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, and business travelers.

Queen Sofa bed and pull out twin bed

There is no parking inside the complex. There is available parking in the vicinity outside the complex.

Grocery Stores, Bars, Italian Restaurants, CVS Pharmacy, Dunking Donuts, Pizzeria, Laundromats and much more within walking distance.

Access to public transportation within walking distance with easy access to Manhattan and Brooklyn.
name: Private Studio; Near All NYC
review: Very nice host, clean, great location, fast response. Like this place a lot
